subject: Football
College Athletics
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The No. 2 L.S.U. Tigers stole the final scene on the sport’s grandest stage, blowing out top-ranked Ohio State to win the program’s third national championship.
snippet: The No. 2 L.S.U. Tigers stole the final scene on the sport’s grandest stage, blowing out top-ranked Ohio State to win the program’s third national championship.
